nodes.text: Tendo was a Mobquet medium transport in the service of the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. The vessel was part of the Imperial II-class Star Destroyer Corrupter's resupply convoy, which was lead by the EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Monitor to where the Corrupter lay damaged in the Mev system. The ship, which bore a cargo of engineering droids, was then attacked by Rebel Alliance raiders and was destroyed along with the rest of the convoy.
